root.name: Tetris Axis
root.description: OverviewTetris Axis is a 3DS version of the classic falling block puzzle game. It features over twenty game modes, local multiplayer support for up to eight players, along with online play for up to six. The game is also compatible with the 3DS's Spotpass functionality. The game was released on October 2, 2011 in physical format and was later made available as a digital download on the eShop.Game ModesFeatured ModesMarathonComputer BattleFeverSurvivalParty ModeStage Racer PlusShadow WideJigsawTower ClimberCaptureFitBombliss PlusSprintMaster ModeAR ModeAR MarathonAR ClimberLocal MultiplayerVS BattleVS Stage RaceVS Shadow WideVS CaptureCo-op Tower ClimberDS Download PlayMarathon with everyoneFever with everyoneVS BattleNintendo Wi-fi Online4 different World Battles
